heading: Crafting Cheat Sheet
content: With many different crafting opportunities in Diablo 4, we added this Crafting Cheat Sheet so you can have an overview of all crafting possibilities in Diablo 4 without needing to go in-game to find all the recipes. This Crafting Cheat Sheet focuses on the most important recipes so that you know exactly what materials are valuable for you. We have certain vendors in Diablo 4 that all have some less impactful crafting recipes. These are not listed in the Crafting Cheat Sheet but the links below redirect you to their respective articles if you want to learn about their crafting options. The first recipe can be found at the , and the others at the These recipes can be found at the These recipes can be found at the These recipes can be found at the These recipes can be found at the Maintained by
